stanza.line: O never say that I was false of (a)heart(/a)
Though absence seemed my flame to (b)qualify(/b)
As easy might I from my self (a)depart(/a)
As from my soul which in thy breast doth (b)lie(/b)
That is my home of love if I have (c)ranged(/c)
Like him that travels I return (d)again(/d)
Just to the time not with the time (c)exchanged(/c)
So that my self bring water for my (d)stain(/d)
Never believe though in my nature (e)reigned(/e)
All frailties that besiege all kinds of (f)blood(/f)
That it could so preposterously be (e)stained(/e)
To leave for nothing all thy sum of (f)good(/f)
For nothing this wide universe I (g)call(/g)
Save thou my rose in it thou art my (g)all(/g)
